feed.title: SparkyFitness Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Release: Improved Diary Insights & AI Provider Update We're excited to roll out the latest update with enhanced nutrition tracking, performance fixes, and improved diagnostics!

‚ú® New Features Fiber Tracking Added: Mini Nutrition chart, food detail view, and subtotals now include fiber data for a more complete nutrition overview.

üîß Fixes & Enhancements üíß Water Intake Fix: Resolved issues affecting water tracking accuracy.

üîê Encryption Diagnostics: Improved logging to help identify inadequate or missing encryption keys.

üß† AI Provider Update: Removed all AI models except Gemini, our only fully-tested and supported AI provider for now.

As always, your feedback helps us grow‚Äîkeep it coming!

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.2
entry.content:
POC fix for auto log out when refreshing the browser.

Update your nginx/other proxy to include below settings. Without this, authentication might have issue based on your proxy

proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme; add_header X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Ssl on;

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [x] AI chatbot clear button
  • [x] Dark theme - background color fix for food unit selection in Diary page
  • [x] Rounded decimal points for Nutrition summary screen

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.4
entry.content:
üöÄ Release: Keycloak OIDC Fix + Mobile Chatbot + Nutrition Chart Auto Refresh ‚úÖ What's Fixed & Improved: üîê Fix for Keycloak OIDC Authentication Thanks to @simcop2387 for offering his test environment to help troubleshoot and resolve the issue.

üçΩÔ∏è Nutrition Chart & Daily Calorie Goal Auto Refresh Now updates instantly while editing foods in the Food Diary for a smoother experience.

ü§ñ AI Chat Bot Mobile Compatibility The chatbot now properly renders and works on mobile devices too.

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.5
entry.content:
üöÄ Release: Bug Fixes & Enhancements ‚úÖ Fixes Fixed case-sensitivity issue with username/email during login.

Restored missing Admin tab in the OIDC settings page.

Added rate limiting to Login & Signup pages using internal Nginx (not external proxy).

‚ú® Enhancements Added ability to quick add foods without saving to the main food library.

ChatBot now renders properly in mobile view.

‚ö†Ô∏è Security Warning Do NOT expose this app directly to the internet. It is still under active development, and not production-hardened. Always deploy behind Cloudflare Access, VPN, or equivalent authentication/firewall layers.

Thanks for all the feedback and support! üôå
